quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Know what you own, and know why you own it.
author: Peter Lynch

quote: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
author: Philip Fisher

quote: Technology is best when it brings people together.
author: Matt Mullenweg

quote: It's not about money. It's about the people you have, and how you're led.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The most valuable commodity I know of is information.
author: Gordon Gekko

quote: Digital transformation is less about technology and more about people.
author: Unknown

quote: May this Raksha Bandhan strengthen the bond of love between us and bring prosperity to your business.
author: Happy Rakhi

quote: Wishing you joy and laughter on Gaijatra. May this festival bring new opportunities to your business.
author: Happy Gaijatra
